dcterms:creator: Su Lin Blodgett
Lisa Green
Brendan Oâ€™Connor
dcterms:description: A dataset containing tweets classified as African American English (AAE) or Mainstream American English (MAE), with a focus on tweets where the model predicted over 80% probability for each class.
dcterms:title: Twitter AAE Dataset

dcterms:description: A collection of subtitles from YouTube movie review videos, focusing on single-speaker videos to control for confounding variables.
dcterms:title: YouTube Dataset

dcterms:creator: Tyler Kendall
Charlie Farrington
dcterms:description: The Corpus of Regional African American Language (CORAAL) consists of socio-linguistic interviews with African American English speakers, providing a rich resource for studying spoken AAE.
dcterms:title: CORAAL (Corpus of Regional African American Language)

dcterms:creator: Mark A Pitt
Keith Johnson
Elizabeth Hume
Scott Kiesling
William Raymond
dcterms:description: The Buckeye Corpus is a collection of conversational speech from central Ohio speakers, focusing on phonetic and linguistic features.
dcterms:title: Buckeye Corpus

dcterms:creator: Geneva Smitherman
dcterms:description: A dataset of expressions from African American English, compiled from the Black Talk dictionary, focusing on words and phrases used within the community.
dcterms:title: African American English Expressions Dataset
